content: I'm planning to use some of these strategies to limit my social media usage after my break. I've realized that I don't need to check my notifications constantly, and it's okay to take a step back and focus on what's truly important to me. By the way, I've been thinking about how my social media usage has changed over time. I used to post about my yoga practice all the time, but now I only post once a month, and it's more of a reflection rather than a bragging post.
